item.title: Custom item help!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

in your server, you have to add the item info for your model. Im not entirely sure how to do that, because i my self don’t mess around with custom models. I did however, make halo models for DragonScape, like masterchief, the sword, rocket launcher, etc. I believe there is a tut in the client hacking section for how to do the models.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom item help!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Yes, your code is perfectly fine. All that “Note:” thing says, is that at least on of the methods in one of the classes in the client is old. It will still work, but it’s saying that there is a better way to do it now.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom item help!
item.dc:creator: @nick888 nick888
item.description:
@nick888 wrote:

okay i made it so everything is perfect the item i added in class 8 shows up in the coding like this(hopefully correct):

anInt180 = (anInt180 + 1) % 10;
Class8 class8 = aClass8Array172[anInt180];
aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183.anInt1406 = anIntArray195[i];
class8.anInt157 = i;
class8.method197();
class8.method203(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183);

if(i == 14556){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.aString170 = “New Years Santa”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “It’s a Santa hat only found on new years”.getBytes();
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0];
class8.anInt174 = 18002;//Inv & Ground
class8.anInt181 = 540;
class8.anInt190 = 72;
class8.anInt198 = 136;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 0;
class8.anInt194 = -3;
class8.anInt165 = 18001;//Male Wield View
class8.anInt200 = 18001;//Female Wield View
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt175 = 69;
class8.anInt197 = 127;
}
if(i == 14539)
{

My item is the new years santa hat, and when i compile this is what i get:

Note: Some Input Files Use Or Override a deprecated API
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Compiling Finished

So what i want to know is that the code is correct?, my drop model is 18002 and my wield model is 18001.
What do i do to fix the compiling error?
What do i do so the item will work on my server?
P.S I haven’t added anything to the server, do i need to?

Read full topic
